data.eml:eml: Revision of the tropical African genus Tetraconcha (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Phaneropterinae) with the description of ten new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Massa, Bruno (2017): Revision of the tropical African genus Tetraconcha (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Phaneropterinae) with the description of ten new species. Journal of Orthoptera Research 26 (2): 211-232, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.26.21469, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/jor.26.21469
